issue.title: [CF 192] Track Currency
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
4.1.3

Please provide any additional information below.

No errors or anything, and I realize that this addon is mainly for combat conditions. I absolutely LOVE this addon and use it on my paladin, DK, priest, and hunter, which are all the classes I use on any regular basis. Thank you for all your hard work.

I do have some TMW icons enabled at all times, and as a tank I tend to accumulate a lot of justice points rather quickly. Sometimes I look at my bags and find I have 4k jps and wonder to myself "How long have I been at the cap?" I was hoping this addon could be configured to tell me when my jps are over 3750.

Thanks again!


> Posted by CurseForge user Bludeye | Imported from CurseForge issue #192 | Raw

comments.body:
The following import string should be what you are looking for (requires r72+)

``` ^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon^SConditions^T^N1^T^SType^SCURRENCY395^SOperator^S>=^SName^S^SLevel^N3750^t^t^SName^Spvecurrency-justice^SEnabled^B^t^N414069^^ ```

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
